#### Supporting Information (*in review*) 
This site provides a demonstrative workflow and supporting information for the publication:  
**Interrogating Genomes and Geography to Unravel Multiyear Vesicular Stomatitis Epizootics**  
  
Authors: Humphreys, Velazquez Salinas, Shults, Bertram, Pelzel-McCluskey, Peters, and  Rodriguez    
   
All code and data shown here can be downloaded from the associated [GitHub site: https://github.com/geoepi/vs-epizootics](https://github.com/geoepi/vs-epizootics)  
:::
